sentence: In early trading on Monday, shares of Walt Disney ( DIS ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.6%.
Year to date, Walt Disney registers a 1.7% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Boeing ( BA ), trading down 0.9%.
Boeing is showing a gain of 82.0% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 0.6%, and Merck ( MRK ), trading up 1.0% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
